messages.body: $IBM $AAPL Why should you buy IBM over Apple https://seekingalpha.com/article/4208882-buy-ibm-apple

links.title: Why You Should Buy IBM Over Apple
links.description: International Business Machines Corp. ( IBM) and Apple ( AAPL) may seem slightly unrelated. However, in this article, I will show why they are connected and why I would buy the former. Apple has continued its ascent with a return of 30% in 2018, whilst the former technology darling, IBM, is down 1.82%.

links.title: Tesla Model 3 drive unit production reportedly hits 10k/week amid end-of-Q3 push
links.description: Despite facing a lawsuit from the Securities and Exchange Commission about his "funding secured" tweet last August, Elon Musk appeared to be in light spirits on Friday, expressing his gratitude to the Tesla community for their help, at one point even posting a "Don't Panic" reminder on his Twitter page.

links.title: Weekly Note 29 Sept 2018
links.description: As the third quarter came to an end this week we had quite a bit of noise coming from the markets. At the beginning of the week, markets digested the news that China would not be entering into trade talks until after the mid term elections, hopeful that they might be in a stronger position...
